meanings.definition: A person who is excessively sentimental or emotional.
meanings.sent1: The group of sentimentalists cried during the sad movie.
meanings.sent2: Many sentimentalists keep old love letters and cards.
meanings.sent3: The sentimentalists laughed at the sappy romantic comedy.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the queen of the sentimentalists.
meanings.sent5: The sentimentalists were moved to tears by the heartfelt speech.

meanings.definition: Those who are prone to indulging in sentimentality.
meanings.sent1: The sentimentalists cherished every moment with their loved ones.
meanings.sent2: Some sentimentalists find joy in nostalgic songs.
meanings.sent3: The sentimentalists enjoyed reminiscing about the good old days.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, she was considered a sentimentalist.
meanings.sent5: The group of sentimentalists gathered to watch the sunset together.
